directions.step:
TEMPERATURE: 375 F. DEEP FAT :
1. SIFT TOGETHER FLOUR, BAKING POWDER, MILK, SALT, SUGAR, NUTMEG AND CINNAMON INTO MIXER BOWL.
2. COMBINE EGGS, WATER, SHORTENING OR SALAD OIL, AND LEMON JUICE; ADD TO DRY INGREDIENTS. MIX AT LOW SPEED UNTIL WELL-BLENDED.
3. DRAIN APPLES AND CHOP COARSELY; ADD TO BATTER; MIX LIGHTLY.
4. USING A NO. 40 SCOOP OR WELL-ROUND TABLESPOON, DROP BATTER INTO DEEP FAT. FRY 4 TO 6 MINUTES. DRAIN ON ABSORBENT PAPER. :
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 3, 6 LB (7 LB 11 OZ A.P.) PARED, CORED AND DICED FRESH APPLES MAY BE USED FOR CANNED APPLES.
2. IN STEP 3, 4 OZ (1 LEMON) FRESH LEMONS A.P. WILL YIELD 2 TBSP JUICE.
3. IN STEP 4, AFTER FRYING, FRITTERS MAY BE SPRINKLED WITH 2 LB (2 QT) SIFTED POWDERED SUGAR.
Recipe Number: D02400
SERVING SIZE: 2 FRITTERS
